MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Jacqueline Drive, Wallace Avenue and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25PM on 20th December 2020.
